description: Installed it and opened it, but nothing happens when I click on it. Using Ubuntu 20.04.6LTS. Will keep an eye on it as it looks like a neat bit of software.
summary: Want to like it but it is unresponsive

description:
I'm in the same boat. I've been looking for an application that will allow me to trim clips and merge Clips easily.

This looks like it could be very easy but I'm having the same experience as Jacob. Non-responsive won't do anything. Saenuma: any suggestions?
Installed and tried to add a video but cannot do this at all. Cannot browse the folders in the home locationa...
